name: Wingardium Leviosa
description:
Wingardium Leviosa is a magic spell that can make objects levitate
Deals 10 damage
Cost 5 mana
win_back: so high that it breached the atmosphere and exploded

name: Vengeful Spirit
description:
Vengeful spirit is a spirit that will fly forward and burn foes in its path
Deals 20 damage
Cost 10 mana
win_front: charged up all your soul and shot a massive vengeful spirit at

name: Megidolaon
description:
Megidolaon is a damage dealing almighty spell
Deals 30 damage
Cost 20 mana
win_front: summoned your persona Satanael and dealt massive almighty damage to

name: Glintstone Cometshard
description:
Glintstone Cometshard fires a comet that moves forward while leaving a trail
Deals 40 damage
Cost 25 mana

name: Will O The Wisp
description:
Will O The Wisp causes the enemy to explode
Deals 50 damage
Cost 30 mana
win_back: until it burnt to a crisp
